name: Hate
description: Hate is a scythe with a cruel blade, wielded by The Stalker.

languages.description: Hate ist eine vom Stalker geführte Sense mit einer brachialen Klinge.
languages.name: Hate

languages.description: La Hate est une lame cruelle maniée par le Stalker.
languages.name: Hate

languages.description: HATE è una falce con una lama crudele, impugnata dallo Stalker.
languages.name: Hate

languages.description: 스토커가 장비하는 헤이트는 악랄한 날을 가진 낫입니다.
languages.name: 헤이트

languages.description: Hate es una guadaña con una hoja cruel, empuñada por Stalker.
languages.name: Hate

languages.description: （英文：HATE）追猎者持有憎恨，这是一把残忍至极的镰刀。
languages.name: 憎恨

languages.description: Ненависть - коса с ужасающим лезвием, носимая Сталкером.
languages.name: Ненависть

languages.description: 因業の刃を備えた大鎌。STALKERも愛用する一振り。
languages.name: Hate

languages.description: Hate to używana przez Stalkera kosa o okrutnym ostrzu.
languages.name: Nienawiść

languages.description: Ódio é uma foice com uma lâmina cruel, brandida pelo Stalker.
languages.name: Ódio

languages.description: （英文：HATE）Stalker 持有憎恨，這是一把殘忍至極的鐮刀。
languages.name: 憎恨

languages.description: Hate คือเคียวที่มาพร้อมกับใบมีดอันเหี้ยมโหด กวัดแกว่งโดย Stalker
languages.name: Hate

languages.description: Hate, Stalker tarafından ustalıkla kullanılan gaddar bir silahtır.
languages.name: Hate
